data.lyric:
[ti:pov]
[ar:Ariana Grande]
[al:Positions]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]pov - Ariana Grande (爱莉安娜·格兰德)
[00:05.23]Lyrics by：Tommy Brown/Ariana Grande/Steven Franks/Oliver Frid/Tayla Parx
[00:10.47]Composed by：Tommy Brown/Ariana Grande/Steven Franks/Oliver Frid/Tayla Parx
[00:15.71]It's like you got superpowers
[00:19.45]Turn my minutes into hours
[00:22.12]You got more than 20/20 babe
[00:25.77]Made of glass the way you see through me
[00:30.31]You know me better than I do
[00:33.83]Can't seem to keep nothing from you
[00:36.68]How you touch my soul from the outside
[00:40.26]Permeate my ego and my pride
[00:43.18]I wanna love me
[00:44.96]Ooh
[00:46.42]The way that you love me
[00:48.49]Ooh
[00:49.89]Ooh for all of my pretty
[00:52.83]And all of my ugly too
[00:54.55]I'd love to see me from your point of view
[00:57.67]I wanna trust me
[00:59.46]Trust me
[01:00.94]The way that you trust me
[01:03.00]Trust me
[01:04.35]Ooh 'cause nobody ever loved me like you do
[01:08.88]I'd love to see me from your point of view
[01:13.88]I'm getting used to receiving
[01:17.49]Still getting good at not leaving
[01:20.32]I'ma love you even though I'm scared
[01:23.06]Oh scared
[01:24.04]Learnin' to be grateful for myself
[01:26.31]Oh oh oh
[01:28.70]You love my lips 'cause they say the
[01:32.24]Things we've always been afraid of
[01:34.90]I can feel it startin' to subside
[01:38.55]Learnin' to believe in what is mine
[01:41.12]I wanna love me
[01:43.10]Ooh
[01:44.58]The way that you love me
[01:46.70]Ooh
[01:48.19]Ooh for all of my pretty
[01:51.02]And all of my ugly too
[01:52.76]I'd love to see me from your point of view
[01:55.67]I wanna trust me
[01:57.56]Trust me
[01:59.07]The way that you trust me
[02:01.18]Trust me
[02:02.48]Ooh 'cause nobody ever loved me like you do
[02:07.23]I'd love to see me from your point of view
[02:11.57]I couldn't believe it or see it for myself
[02:15.21]Boy I be impatient but now I'm out here
[02:18.48]Fallin' fallin' frozen slowly
[02:22.07]Fallin' got me right
[02:25.21]I won't keep you waitin'
[02:26.65]Waitin'
[02:27.92]All my baggage fadin' safely
[02:30.47]My baggage fadin'
[02:32.09]And if my eyes deceive me
[02:34.71]Won't let them stray too far away
[02:39.38]I wanna love me
[02:41.43]Ooh
[02:42.77]The way that you love me
[02:44.94]Ooh
[02:46.19]Ooh for all of my pretty
[02:49.11]And all of my ugly too
[02:50.66]I'd love to see me from your point of view
[02:53.93]I wanna trust me ooh
[02:55.92]Trust me
[02:57.34]The way that you trust me baby
[02:59.62]Trust me
[03:01.90]'Cause nobody ever loved me like you do
[03:05.32]I'd love to see me from your point of view
[03:07.74]Oh
[03:08.87]Yeah
data.trans:
[ti:pov]
[ar:Ariana Grande]
[al:Positions]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:05.23]//
[00:10.47]//
[00:15.71]就好像你有超能力
[00:19.45]让我感觉时间漫长无比
[00:22.12]你的目光无比犀利 宝贝
[00:25.77]一眼就能看穿我 就好像我是一块玻璃
[00:30.31]你比我更了解我自己
[00:33.83]似乎什么都瞒不住你
[00:36.68]你总能触动我的灵魂
[00:40.26]影响我的自信和骄傲
[00:43.18]我想爱我自己
[00:44.96]//
[00:46.42]就像你爱我那样
[00:48.49]//
[00:49.89]不管我的好与坏 
[00:52.83]通通都爱
[00:54.55]我很想站在你的角度看看我自己
[00:57.67]我想相信我自己
[00:59.46]相信我自己
[01:00.94]就像你相信我那样
[01:03.00]相信我自己
[01:04.35]因为没人像你这样爱过我
[01:08.88]我很想站在你的角度看看我自己
[01:13.88]我渐渐习惯了被爱
[01:17.49]所以不曾打算离开
[01:20.32]我要爱你 即使我曾受过伤
[01:23.06]受过伤
[01:24.04]我要学会感谢我自己
[01:26.31]//
[01:28.70]你爱我的双唇 因为它们说出了
[01:32.24]我们一直害怕说出来的话语
[01:34.90]我能感受到 疑虑渐渐消失了
[01:38.55]开始相信 有些东西就是属于我
[01:41.12]我想爱我自己
[01:43.10]//
[01:44.58]就像你爱我那样
[01:46.70]//
[01:48.19]不管我的好与坏
[01:51.02]通通都爱
[01:52.76]我很想站在你的角度看看我自己
[01:55.67]我想相信我自己
[01:57.56]相信我自己
[01:59.07]就像你相信我那样
[02:01.18]相信我自己
[02:02.48]因为没人像你这样爱过我
[02:07.23]我很想站在你的角度看看我自己
[02:11.57]我不敢相信 没法看清自己的模样
[02:15.21]男孩 我没耐心 但现在我在这里
[02:18.48]渐渐沦陷 无法抵抗
[02:22.07]恋爱的感觉让我无法自拔
[02:25.21]我不会让你等待
[02:26.65]等待
[02:27.92]我渐渐放下了心理负担
[02:30.47]心理负担渐渐消失
[02:32.09]如果我的眼睛欺骗我
[02:34.71]我不会让我的视线偏离你的身边
[02:39.38]我想爱我自己
[02:41.43]//
[02:42.77]就像你爱我那样
[02:44.94]//
[02:46.19]不管我的好与坏
[02:49.11]通通都爱
[02:50.66]我很想站在你的角度看看我自己
[02:53.93]我想相信我自己
[02:55.92]相信我自己
[02:57.34]就像你相信我那样 宝贝
[02:59.62]相信我自己
[03:01.90]因为没人像你这样爱过我
[03:05.32]我很想站在你的角度看看我自己
[03:07.74]//
[03:08.87]//
